title: Scheduled Maintenance - Platform Improvements
description: We will be performing scheduled maintenance to improve platform performance and add new security features.

content.data:
Dear ClassX Users,

We will be performing scheduled maintenance on our platform to implement important improvements:

Maintenance Window:
• Date: December 18, 2024
• Time: 2:00 AM - 6:00 AM EST
• Duration: Approximately 4 hours

What's being improved:
• Enhanced server performance
• New security protocols
• Database optimization
• UI/UX improvements

During this time, the platform will be temporarily unavailable. We apologize for any inconvenience and appreciate your patience.

All your progress and data will be safely preserved.

content.caption: New security protocols being implemented
